column3: set to =1 to turn on the lake model

lake depth (in meters); if no lake depth
information is available in the input data, 
this value is set to 50 m

minimum elevation of lakes; can be used to
determine whether a water point is a lake
in the absence of a lake category; if the
landuse type includes 'lake' (e.g., Modis_lake
and USGS_LAKE), this variables is ignored

option to use lake depth data provided by
the geogrid program
